ModMetaData.name: Amplified Mobility Platform
ModMetaData.author: AobaKuma
ModMetaData.description:
a simple mod that add Amplified Mobility Platform and it's gears in the movie Avatar into rimworld
The Mitsubishi MK-6 Amplified Mobility Platform (or "AMP" suit) is a distant descendant of the first military exoskeletons used on Earth in the mid-21st century__Avatar Wiki
support CE.
